verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
HE ALONE IS WORTHY.
Christ alone is worthy. He alone is worthy of all
praise.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He's the King of all kings, the Lord of all lords,
and I love Him, I adore Him, yes, I do.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For He alone is worthy. Christ alone is worthy.
He alone is worthy of all praise.
